resources: ((2^2)^3) = 2^5 The slope of a vertical line is undefined. Two lines with positive slopes can be perpendicular. //false 5 is greater than 10 or 5 is greater than 7. //true The set of ordered pairs {(6,4),(2,-5),(-2,4),(6,-4)} is a function. //false The additive inverse of -10 is 10. //true The product of two positive numbers is NOT positive. //false x + 2 = 7 is called an inequality. //false The associative property is used to write 4x + 8y = 4(x + 2y). //false
